author: AFP
title: Coronavirus | Italy’s virus toll shoots back up, but medics see hope
description: Italy's 743 new deaths broke two days of successive declines that had taken the number down to 601 on Monday.
content:
Italy's daily COVID-19 death toll shot back up on Tuesday, but more evidence emerged that the coronavirus infection rate is slowing thanks to a painful national lockdown.
Also read: Coronavirus | Italys death toll tops 4,000 after new one-day record
